publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3356 Ms Margo MacDonald: Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee-That the Parliament urges the International Olympic Committee to adopt a more rigorous regime that will conclusively and unambiguously identify methamphetamine in tests for banned substances carried out on athletes to ensure that no athlete is automatically banned from competing with the subsequent loss of reputation, earnings and, in the case of Alain Baxter, an Olympic medal which was won fairly and without the use of a performance-enhancing drug, as objective scientific opinion now verifies. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3356 Ms Margo MacDonald: Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee-That the Parliament urges the International Olympic Committee to adopt a more rigorous regime that will conclusively and unambiguously identify methamphetamine in tests for banned substances carried out on athletes to ensure that no athlete is automatically banned from competing with the subsequent loss of reputation, earnings and, in the case of Alain Baxter, an Olympic medal which was won fairly and without the use of a performance-enhancing drug, as objective scientific opinion now verifies. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Phil Gallie*, Michael Matheson*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Helen Eadie*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Russell*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Colin Campbell*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3356 Drug Testing Regime of the International Olympic Committee (lodged on 5 September 2002) Irene McGugan*
